Package RRPSS

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • RRPSS.MainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This Class handles the implementation of the MainMenu and the resulting changes that the user can do to the said Menu. It also handles creation/editing/removing of packages and menu items for the menu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This method deals with the editing of the description of a MenuItem

        public void addMainCourse​(java.lang.String s_one,
                          java.lang.Double d_one,
                          java.lang.String s_two)
        THis method deals with the creation/addition of a MainCourse to an existing Menu or a existing/New Package
        Parameters:
        s_one - gets the name for the main course
        d_one - gets the price to be fixed for the main course
        s_two - gets the description for the item

      • searchByName

        public MenuItems searchByName​(java.lang.String name)
        This method deals with the searching of a MenuItem in the Menu by getting a String name input from the user
        Parameters:
        name - gets the name to be searched in the Menu
        Returns:
        It returns the MenuItem object of the required name from the Menu

        This method deals with the searching of MenuItem in the Menu by getting the index from the user
        Parameters:
        index - gets the index to be searched in the Menu
        Returns:
        It returns the MenuItem object of the required index from the Menu

      • editItemName

        public void editItemName​(int index,
                         java.lang.String Name)
        This method deals with the editing of the name of a MenuItem ie Individual MenuItems (or Package Names which are stored as MenuItems)
        Parameters:
        index - gets the index of the MenuItems from the Menu
        Name - the new name to replace the pre-existing name of the said MenuItem

      • editItemPrice

        public void editItemPrice​(int index,
                          java.lang.Double Price)
        This method deals with the editing of the price of a MenuItem ie Individual MenuItems
        Parameters:
        index - gets the index of the MenuItems from the Menu
        Price - the new price to replace the pre-existing price of the said MenuItem

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem​(int index)
        This method removes any item from the Main Menu ie Individual MenuItems or Packages
        Parameters:
        index - gets the index from the user of the object to remove

      • print

        public void print()
        This method prints out all the contents of the Menu ie Individual MenuItems and the Packages

      • createPackage

        public void createPackage​(java.lang.String pname,
                          double pprice)
        This method creates a Package and gets the user to input the Name, Price of the Package they are creating It also gets the user to choose the MenuItems which would be then stored in the Package The Description of the Package is the name of the contents of the Package chosen by the user ie the MenuItems that have been selected to be in the Package eg. Description: "Chicken Biriyani+Tea+Halwa"

      • printMenuItems

        public void printMenuItems()
        This method prints only the MenuItems of the entire menu excluding the Packages

      • printPackage

        public void printPackage()
        This method prints only the Packages of the Menu excluding the MenuItems

      • printPackageContents

        public void printPackageContents​(int index)
        This method edits the Packages of the Menu. It does this by printing the available Packages and getting the user to choose from that Once the user chooses an option they are then asked to choose to edit between the name/price of the package or editing the content of the Packages

      • addPackageItem

        public void addPackageItem​(int Pindex,
                           int itemIndex)
        This method adds MenuItems to the specified Package
        Parameters:
        Pindex - - is the index of the Package to which the MenuItem should be added
        itemIndex - - is the index of the MenuItem to be added to the Package

      • removePackageItem

        public void removePackageItem​(int Pindex,
                              int PitemIndex)
        This method deals with the removal of MenuItem from the Package
        Parameters:
        Pindex - - get the Package which we want to remove Items from
        PitemIndex - - the index of the MenuItem from the Package to remove

      • removePackage

        public void removePackage​(int index)
        This method deals with the removal of Package by the index number
